subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bill Bradley said the Lakers, who are coached by his former teammate Phil Jackson, play with the same qualities that helped the Knicks win N.B.A. titles in 1970 and ’73.
snippet: Bill Bradley said the Lakers, who are coached by his former teammate Phil Jackson, play with the same qualities that helped the Knicks win N.B.A. titles in 1970 and ’73.
